name: Wonders of the World Puzzle Package
name_original: Wonders of the World Puzzle Package
description: Enjoy 24 well illustrated full color digital puzzles in this wonders of the world  puzzle package. This set of puzzles features both natural and man made wonders. The wonders span the world from America to the Philippines. The four available  puzzle sizes are: 24,48,70 and,96 pieces. So pull up a comfy chair, get a fresh  cup of tea and take a short relaxing respite from the stressors of life and do a puzzle.
